name: Mary Jane Kelly
biography: Mary Jane (or mj) is a computer security consultant responsible for data analytics and anti-fraud strategies at Casaba Security. She has a background in programming, consulting, and statistics with experience in the security space. Mary Jane is active in tech community events, founding the Seattle chapter of Girls In Tech, organizing the 2007 Northwest Security Symposium, volunteering in educational security events, and participating in local tech meetups. She also loves working on robotics and geek art.
